Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities We are looking for passionate programmers & developers to join our technical team at Brucode. You will be working alongside some of the highly skilled & committed developers in the industry. You will be required to put in your best & unleash the maximum potential of your technical & analytical abilities. Your skills will be challenged each day & if you are the one who see challenges as opportunities, we are looking for you. Come & be a part of our family. You will be in for a highly rewarding career with a great learning curve & many other benefits.Desired Candidate Profile Must be able to program in Asp.net, C#, Entity Framework, jQuery, HTML, CSS.Good to have knowledge of Asp.Net MVC, Asp.Net Core, WebAPI, REST, Bootstrap.Must be able to understand, write & optimize database queries, joins & stored procedures.Good to have knowledge of repositories like Git, BitBucket, SVN & tools like Bugzilla, Basecamp, JIRA etc.Must be able to create, analyze & understand the functional specifications & write the code for the same in a well-structured manner following best coding practices.Should be able to debug existing source codes to find the bugs & apply necessary fixes.Should be ready to work independently & in a team in a dynamic environment.Should have a positive attitude & commitment towards work with high ethical values.Perks and Benefits > A friendly & healthy work environment.> Highly experienced team to work with & learn from.> A steep knowledge curve & quick growth opportunity.> Flexible timings available.
UG: BCA in Computers, Any Graduate in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers
PG: Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization, MCA in Computers
